title: UFC on ESPN 6's Kyle Bochniak talks hometown fight with Sean Woodson
text:
CAMBRIDGE, Mass. – You don’t have to twist Gloucester, Mass. native Kyle Bochniak’s arm to hard to get him to fight at his hometown TD Garden.

Bochniak (8-4 MMA, 2-4 UFC) will meet Sean Woodson (6-0 MMA, 0-0 UFC) in a featherweight preliminary-card bout at UFC on ESPN 6. And while he’s excited for the opportunity to make the short drive from Route 128 to 95 to 93 to the Garden, Bochniak also knows this is an important matchup at this stage in his UFC career, so he’s not going to take his opponent lightly.

UFC on ESPN 6 takes place Friday at TD Garden in Boston. The card airs on ESPN2.

To hear Bochniak’s full UFC on ESPN 6 media scrum held Wednesday, click on the video linked above.
description: Kyle Bochniak fights Sean Woodson at UFC on ESPN 6.
